mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.buyer_id, o.total_pay_money, o.total_freight, o.total_buy_count, o.create_time, o.pay_type, o.order_status, bd.base_name AS payTypeShow, bd2.base_name AS orderStatusShow, GROUP_CONCAT(od.product_name) AS productNameShow FROM djmall_order o LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_base_data bd ON o.pay_type = bd.base_code LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_base_data bd2 ON o.order_status = bd2.base_code LEFT JOIN djmall_order_detail od ON o.order_no = od.parent_order_no WHERE o.buyer_id = #{userId} AND o.order_status = 'PENDING_PAYMENT' GROUP BY o.order_no

SELECT o.order_no, o.total_money, o.total_pay_money, o.total_freight, o.pay_type, o.receiver_province, o.receiver_city, o.receiver_county, o.receiver_name, o.receiver_phone, o.receiver_detail, o.order_status, o.create_time, o.pay_time, od.product_name, od.sku_info, od.buy_count, od.pay_money, od.sku_rate, bd.base_name AS payTypeShow FROM djmall_order o LEFT JOIN djmall_order_detail od ON o.order_no = od.parent_order_no LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_base_data bd ON o.pay_type = bd.base_code WHERE o.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT o.order_no, o.total_money, o.total_pay_money, o.total_freight, o.pay_type, o.receiver_province, o.receiver_city, o.receiver_county, o.receiver_name, o.receiver_phone, o.receiver_detail, o.order_status, o.create_time, o.pay_time, od.product_name, od.sku_info, od.buy_count, od.pay_money, od.sku_rate, bd.base_name AS payTypeShow FROM djmall_order_info o LEFT JOIN djmall_order_detail od ON o.order_no = od.child_order_no LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_base_data bd ON o.pay_type = bd.base_code WHERE o.order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE djmall_product_sku sku INNER JOIN djmall_order_detail od ON sku.id = od.sku_id SET sku.sku_count = sku.sku_count + od.buy_count WHERE od.parent_order_no = #{order}
mapper.select: SELECT ( COUNT(0) - SUM(od.is_comment) ) AS isComment FROM djmall_order_detail od WHERE od.child_order_no = #{orderNo}
